title: AN ACT relating to sex-based classifications.
subject: Children and Minors
Civil Rights
Corrections Impact
Education, Elementary and Secondary
Education, Higher
Local Government
Local Mandate
Men
Short Titles and Popular Names
State Agencies
Women

abstracts.abstract: Create new sections of KRS Chapter 61 to define "boy," "equal," "female," "girl," "male," "man," "sex," and "woman"; prohibit any state or local law, regulation, ordinance, or policy from treating males or females unfairly from similiarly situated members of the opposite sex, but permit separation of the sexes if in the interest of maintaining safety, privacy, and fairness; provide a non-exhaustive list of examples of areas in which public entities may distinguish between the sexes; require any public school, public school district, state agency, department, local government, special district or any political subdivision of those entities that collects vital statistics to identify each person as either male or female; provide that the Act may be cited as the Kentucky Women's Bill of Rights.
